channel.title: [PI] Making Ags Spec more Powerful REP++
channel.description:
Hey Everyone,
I currently am using a basic PI, and I have a perfectly fine AGS spec,
The problem is, the spec isn't as powerful as it should be, how would I make it hit a little bit harder? (Not in item.cfg)
Like, just make the special attack hit harder,
Thanks REP++ as always ;)

item.title: [PI] Making Ags Spec more Powerful REP++
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

[quote=“gnomez, post:4, topic:399025”][quote author=aquikzebra link=topic=496160.msg3627281#msg3627281 date=1307930372]

Can you post the spec code, In code tag’s of-course

Where do I find it
[/quote]

Alright, I will look
client.java depending on the source, revision, base, ect[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Making Ags Spec more Powerful REP++
